title: Debug and fix issue #60
body:
Root Causes Identified:
1. Tag input stayed visible after adding a tag, providing no feedback
2. No loading state during API operations, causing user confusion
3. Silent error handling with no user-visible feedback
4. Potential event propagation conflicts with handleClickOutside

Implemented Fixes:
1. Added tagOperationLoading state to track loading per article
2. Updated addArticleTag to:
   - Show loading spinner during API call
   - Close tag input after successful add (clear visual feedback)
   - Display user-friendly error messages on failure
   - Properly handle async state updates
3. Updated removeArticleTag with consistent loading/error handling
4. Enhanced handleClickOutside to exclude .tag-input-container class
5. UI improvements:
   - Added loading spinner to add/remove buttons
   - Disabled all interactive elements during operations
   - Prevented Enter key submission during loading
   - Added visual feedback with disabled states

This addresses issue #60 which was reopened after PR #61. The previous fix only added stopPropagation, but the core UX issues remained (no feedback, input staying open, silent errors).

Closes #60

title: Find and fix root cause issue
body:
Root cause:
- PDF download card displayed hardcoded "BYD 2024 Financial Report" regardless of selected customer (e.g., Goodyear)
- Download button had no onClick handler and was non-functional

Solution:
- Removed the hardcoded PDF download card completely
- Removed unused translation strings (downloadPdfTitle, pdfFileName)
- Users can manage financial documents through the Document Management system which already supports the "Financial Operations" category

Fixes #53

title: Resolve GitHub issue #60 in ALIA_PROD
body:
Fixed an issue where clicking the plus button to add tags in the market insights feature had no response. The problem was caused by a global click event listener (handleClickOutside) that was interfering with the button's onClick handler.

Changes:
- Added e.stopPropagation() to the plus button click handler
- Added e.stopPropagation() to the tag input container and all buttons within
- This prevents the global click listener from interfering with tag input interactions

Resolves #60

title: 市场洞察，添加标签功能，按添加符号后，没响应，标签似乎并没添加。
Fix GitHub issue #57 bug
body:
Replace global keyword search with per-article custom tagging system as specified in issue #57. Users can now add custom tags to individual articles within their news summary boxes.

Changes:
- Database: Added user_article_tags table with migration script
- Backend: Added 3 new API endpoints for tag management
  - GET /api/market-insights/article/:articleId/tags
  - POST /api/market-insights/article/:articleId/tags
  - DELETE /api/market-insights/article/:articleId/tags/:tagName
- Frontend API: Added getArticleTags, addArticleTag, removeArticleTag methods
- UI: Removed global custom tags filter from filter panel
- UI: Added per-article tagging UI to each article card with:
  - Display of existing tags as removable pills
  - Add tag button that expands to show input field
  - Inline tag addition with Enter key support

Fixes #57

title: fix: correct ROE and debt ratio percentage conversion in financial st…
body:
…atements

Fixed the issue where financial information was displaying incorrectly after entry. The problem was that ROE and debt_ratio values were not being properly converted between percentages (for user input/display) and decimals (for database storage).

Changes:
- When saving: Convert percentage input to decimal by dividing by 100 (15 -> 0.15)
- When editing: Convert decimal back to percentage for form by multiplying by 100 (0.15 -> 15)
- Display logic (formatPercentDisplay) already correctly multiplies by 100

This fixes issue #9 where users entered "15" for 15% but it was stored as 15.0 and then displayed as "1500%" instead of "15%".

title: 市场洞察：阅读全文的“翻译全文”功能没有效果
Fix blank screen in market insights full article
body:
The ArticleModal component was importing Sheet components but using Dialog components in the JSX, which were not imported. This caused a blank screen when clicking "Read Full Article" in Market Insights.

Fixed by replacing all Dialog/DialogContent/DialogHeader/DialogTitle references with their Sheet equivalents that are properly imported.

Fixes issue: blank screen when clicking "阅读全文" in Market Insights

title: fix: resolve customer header display inconsistency in Customer Insigh…
body:
…ts page

Fixed issue #40 where selecting a customer (e.g., Samsung) from the dropdown would update the news content correctly but fail to update the page header, which continued showing the previously selected customer (e.g., Goodyear).

Root cause: The company lookup logic had a fallback that always returned allCompaniesForDropdown[0] when the selected company wasn't found, even when selectedCompany had a valid value. This caused the header to display the first company in the list instead of the selected one.

Solution: Modified the company selection logic to:
- Only search for a company when selectedCompany has a value
- Return undefined if the selected company is not found (handled by existing error UI)
- Only use the first company as default when no company is selected

This ensures the header always displays the correct customer name that matches the selected customer and loaded news content.

title: Claude/fix issue 11 011 full text
Fix bug from GitHub issue #43
body:
Fixed two issues reported in GitHub issue #43:

1. Breadcrumb navigation: Made parent breadcrumb items clickable when viewing detail pages. Previously clicking "任务管理" (Task Management) from the task detail page had no response.

2. Assignee field display: Fixed character encoding issue where assignee field showed user_id instead of the user's actual name. Now displays the full name by combining assigned_user_first_name and assigned_user_last_name from the backend response.

Changes:
- src/components/Breadcrumb.tsx: Update breadcrumb items to be clickable when detail pages are added
- src/components/pages/TaskDetail.tsx: Use user name fields instead of user_id for assignee display

title: fix: improve article modal layout to display full text correctly
body:
- Changed DialogContent to use flex layout instead of grid
- Added dedicated scrollable container for article content
- Ensured header stays fixed while content scrolls
- Fixed issue where full article text was not fully visible

Fixes #11
